I've only had 2 mammograms total and I found both uncomfortable. My appointment is tomorrow morning. I am scared and worried. Thank you for sending positive thoughts.
Posts.Title: Cancer, rinse, repeat ? bluewillowskys AlexaP

Posts.Content: Jun 3, 2014 12:19AM jkg wrote: good grief! It's horrible we all have this in common. I came home today to a voicemail to call the hospital for my mammogram results (instant panic as last year they called my cell with good news). I've been told there is a nodular density in my other breast and I am freaking out!!! I can't do this all over again. I have to wait 2 weeks for a follow up cone mammogram and ultrasound, anyone heard of this type of mammogram? Thanks.
